title: edjing PE - Turntables DJ Mix v2.0.0
description:
edjing is the best Pro DJ app on Android!

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the 1st social DJ App to Play, Mix and Share your sounds!
A perfect way to share your passion for music and let others discover your mixing talent!

The pro version natively includes:

- the Pre Cueing option so you can prepare your transitions in advance
- TK Filter (Convergent + Divergent) to play with the resonance frequencies of your music

edjing PRO EXCLUSIVITY : DEEZER COMPATIBILITY
In addition to your Android native Music file, access the whole Deezer catalogue and mix more than 15 million tracks! (available for Deezer Premium Plus Accounts)

JUST LIKE A REAL DJ WOULD
Realize professional-like transitions thanks to the crossfader. Match the beats manually or click on the Sync button to synchronize the bpm (beats per minute) of your tracks.

PLAY. MIX. SHARE & PARTY!
Being a DJ has never been so affordable! Party all night with edjing! Wow your friends during parties by mixing your songs like a Pro DJ or let edjing mix your playlists while youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re dancing your heart out!

Thanks to the Auto mix, edjing does all the transitions for you. You can customize the transitions you want and program the auto synchronization of bpm (auto sync bpm option) so that the beats of your music always match.

Have fun & Remix the trendiest tracks of the moment on your new pocket turntables!

FEEL THE BEATS & REINVENT YOUR MUSIC:
Add Pro DJ effects and keep reinventing the music you love! Scratch or add special sound effects to enrich your mix and create new sounds: your sound!
Enjoy a wide range of pro sound effects: scratch, flanger, echo, loop, pitch, equalizer, cue point. 

You can add multiple DJ effects at the same time: scratch on a loop or add a Flanger on a loop for instance.
You can also get more advanced Pro DJ effects via our in-app Store!
All the effects are available via the FX menu (FX button at the bottom of the turntable)

RECORD & SHARE YOUR CREATIONS WITH YOUR FRIENDS:
Record your mixes and share them with your friends on Facebook and Twitter thanks to the "eMix" feature. Record up to a whole hour of mixing. After recording your mix, donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t forget to share them with your friends.

Let yourself immerse in a world of music: yours!

General Characteristics:

- OS: Android 4.0 and upper
- Screen Compatibility 3.7" & upper
- RAM size > 1GB (recommended)
- eMix function to share your mix on Facebook and Twitter (depending on Android phone)
- Direct Access to your Android native Music file to mix your own music
- SoundCloud & Deezer Compatibility
- edjing PE Exclusivity: Pre Cueing & TK Filter natively included
- 2 Turntables + Cross Fader 
- Scratch / Pitch on Vinyl 
- Wide Sound Spectrum for optimum Beats localization 
- Pro DJ effects (FX): Cue, Flanger, Loop, Echo, equalizer
- A store with additional effects (FX): Reverse, Double flipping, Auto Scratch, Reverbs, TK Oscilllator, Gate
- The possibility to earn vinyls to buy effects
- Recording in High Definition CD quality, wave format 
- "AutoMix" mode for automatic transitions
- BPM synchronization (sync)
- Ability to remix mp3 files of more than 1 hour

What's New:

Huge graphic redesign: soberer and more refined interface for even more comfort!
Brand new Audio Spectrum with a more concise beat marking
Loop viewer in the Audio Spectrum
Cue points marking in the Audio Spectrum
